title.raw: 《孝景本紀》 Annals of the Xiaojing Emperor

sentences.zh: 孝景皇帝者，孝文之中子也。

translations.literal: Emperor Xiaojing was Emperor Xiaowen's middle son.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaojing was the middle son of Emperor Xiaowen.

translations.literal: Mother Empress Dowager Dou.
translations.idiomatic: His mother was Empress Dowager Dou.

sentences.zh: 孝文在代時，前后有三男，及竇太后得幸，前后死，及三子更死，故孝景得立。

translations.literal: When Xiaowen was in Dai, he had three sons before and after, and when Empress Dowager Dou found favor, the previous ones died, and the three sons died again, therefore Xiaojing was able to be established.
translations.idiomatic: While Emperor Xiaowen was still in Dai as prince, he had three sons from earlier and later periods. After Empress Dowager Dou rose to power, the previous sons died, and then those three sons died as well. This is why Emperor Xiaojing was able to ascend the throne.

translations.literal: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen. His mother was Empress Dou. When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.
First year fourth month yimao, granted amnesty to all under Heaven.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of his first year, on the yimao day, he granted a general amnesty throughout the empire.

translations.literal: Yisi, bestowed nobility one level on the people.
translations.idiomatic: On the yisi day, he granted the common people one level of nobility rank.

sentences.zh: 五月，除田半租，為孝文立太宗廟。

translations.literal: Fifth month, eliminated half land tax, established Supreme Ancestral Temple for Xiaowen.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, he eliminated the half-tax on agricultural land and established the Supreme Ancestral Temple for Emperor Xiaowen.

translations.literal: Ordered assembled ministers without court congratulations.
translations.idiomatic: He ordered the assembled ministers to dispense with the court congratulations ceremony.

translations.literal: Xiongnu entered Dai, made agreement for peaceful marriage alliance.
translations.idiomatic: The Xiongnu invaded Dai, so he made a treaty of peaceful marriage alliance with them.

translations.literal: In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world. On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level. Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen. Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations. The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.

sentences.zh: 二年春，封故相國蕭何孫系為武陵侯。

translations.literal: Second year spring, enfeoffed former Prime Minister Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.
translations.idiomatic: In the spring of his second year, he enfeoffed Xiao Xi, grandson of the former Prime Minister Xiao He, as Marquis of Wuling.

translations.literal: Men at twenty obtained registration.
translations.idiomatic: Men were registered for official service at the age of twenty.

translations.literal: Fourth month renwu, Empress Dowager Xiaowen collapsed.
translations.idiomatic: On the renwu day of the fourth month, Empress Dowager Xiaowen passed away.

translations.literal: Kings of Guangchuan and Changsha all went to their states.
translations.idiomatic: The Kings of Guangchuan and Changsha both departed for their respective fiefs.

translations.literal: Prime Minister Shentu Jia died.
translations.idiomatic: Prime Minister Shentu Jia passed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，以御史大夫開封陶青為丞相。

translations.literal: Eighth month, made Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing Prime Minister.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, he appointed Tao Qing of Kaifeng, the Imperial Secretary, as Prime Minister.

translations.literal: Comet appeared northeast.
translations.idiomatic: A comet appeared in the northeast.

sentences.zh: 秋，衡山雨雹，大者五寸，深者二尺。

translations.literal: Autumn, Hengshan rained hail, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet.
Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen.
Moon appeared between Beichen.
Jupiter moved retrograde in Heavenly Court center.

sentences.zh: 置南陵及內史、祋祤為縣。

translations.literal: Established Nanling and also Neishi and Qirong as counties.

Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling. Men at twenty receive registration. Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died. Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs. Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died. Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor. Comet appeared in the northeast. Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet. Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen. Moon appeared between Beichen. Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court. Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.
Third year first month yisi, granted amnesty to all under Heaven.
Long star appeared west.

sentences.zh: 天火燔雒陽東宮大殿城室。

translations.literal: Heavenly fire burned Luoyang Eastern Palace great hall city chambers.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞、楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠反，發兵西鄉。

translations.literal: King Bi of Wu, King Wu of Chu, King Sui of Zhao, King Ang of Jiaoxi, King Pi Guang of Jinan, King Xian of Zichuan, King Xiong Qu of Jiaodong rebelled, sent troops west toward.

sentences.zh: 天子為誅晁錯，遣袁盎諭告，不止，遂西圍梁。

translations.literal: Son of Heaven to execute Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to admonish inform, did not stop, consequently west besieged Liang.

sentences.zh: 上乃遣大將軍竇嬰、太尉周亞夫將兵誅之。

translations.literal: Emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yafu to lead troops execute them.
Sixth month yihai.

sentences.zh: 赦亡軍及楚元王子藝等與謀反者。

translations.literal: Granted amnesty to deserters and Chu Yuan Wang's son Yi and others who participated in rebellion.

sentences.zh: 封大將軍竇嬰為魏其侯。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.

sentences.zh: 立楚元王子平陸侯禮為楚王。

translations.literal: Installed Chu Yuan Wang's son Ping Lu Hou Li as King of Chu.

sentences.zh: 立皇子端為膠西王，子勝為中山王。

translations.literal: Installed imperial son Duan as King of Jiaoxi, son Sheng as King of Zhongshan.

sentences.zh: 徙濟北王志為菑川王，淮陽王餘為魯王，汝南王非為江都王。

translations.literal: Moved King Zhi of Jibei to be King of Zichuan, King Yu of Huaiyang to be King of Lu, King Fei of Runan to be King of Jiangdu.
King Jiang Lu of Qi, King Jia of Yan both passed away.

Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world. Long star appeared in the west. Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms. Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west. The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west. The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them. Sixth month on the day Binghai. Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion. Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi. Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King. Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King. Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King. Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.
Fourth year summer, established crown prince.
Installed imperial son Che as King of Jiaodong.
Sixth month jiayou, granted amnesty to all under Heaven.

sentences.zh: 後九月，更以（弋）［易］陽為陽陵。

translations.literal: Later ninth month, changed Yiyang to Yangling.
Again established ferry passes, using tallies for entry exit.
Winter, made Zhao state into Handan commandery.

Fourth year summer, established the crown prince. Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King. Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world. After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling. Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit. Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.
Fifth year third month, constructed Yangling, Wei Bridge.

sentences.zh: 五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。

translations.literal: Fifth month, recruited people to move to Yangling, gave money two hundred thousand.

sentences.zh: 江都大暴風從西方來，壞城十二丈。

translations.literal: Jiangdu great violent wind came from west, destroyed city wall twelve zhang.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，封長公主子蟜為隆慮侯。

translations.literal: Dingmao, enfeoffed eldest princess's son Jiao as Marquis of Longlu.
Moved King of Guangchuan to be King of Zhao.

Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge. Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand. Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang. On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu. Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.

sentences.zh: 六年春，封中尉（趙）綰為建陵侯，江都丞相嘉為建平侯，隴西太守渾邪為平曲侯，趙丞相嘉為江陵侯，故將軍布為鄃侯。

translations.literal: Sixth year spring, enfeoffed Chamberlain for Imperial Insignia Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Prime Minister Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hunye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Prime Minister Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former general Bu as Marquis of Zou.
Liang Chu two kings both passed away.

sentences.zh: 後九月，伐馳道樹，殖蘭池。

translations.literal: Later ninth month, cut down galloping road trees, planted Orchid Pool.

Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju. Liang and Chu two kings both died. After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.

sentences.zh: 七年冬，廢栗太子為臨江王。

translations.literal: Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li to be King of Linjiang.
Eleventh month last day, sun had eclipse.
Spring, exempted convicts servants working on Yangling.
Prime Minister Qing dismissed.

sentences.zh: 二月乙巳，以太尉條侯周亞夫為丞相。

translations.literal: Second month yisi, made Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yafu Prime Minister.

sentences.zh: 四月乙巳，立膠東王太后為皇后。

translations.literal: Fourth month yisi, installed King of Jiaodong's mother as Empress.
Dingsi, installed King of Jiaodong as crown prince.
Named Che.

Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King. Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun. Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling. Chancellor Qing resigned. Second month on the day Biji, appointed Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yaofu as chancellor. Fourth month on the day Biji, established Jiaodong King's mother as empress. On the day Dingsi, established Jiaodong King as crown prince. Named Che.

sentences.zh: 中元年，封故御史大夫周苛孫平為繩侯，故御史大夫周昌（子）［孫］左車為安陽侯，四月乙巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.literal: Zhongyuan first year, enfeoffed former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuoche as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month yisi, granted amnesty to all under Heaven, bestowed nobility one level.
Lifted prohibitions restraints.
Earth moved.

sentences.zh: 衡山、原都雨雹，大者尺八寸。

translations.literal: Hengshan, Yuandu rained hail, large ones one chi eight cun.

Middle first year, enfeoffed former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuo Che as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month on the day Biji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. Abolished prohibitions and restrictions. Earthquake. Hengshan, Yuandu hail fell, large ones one chi eight inches.

sentences.zh: 中二年二月，匈奴入燕，遂不和親。

translations.literal: Zhongyuan second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, consequently did not make peaceful marriage alliance.
Third month, summoned King of Linjiang to come.
Immediately died in Chamberlain for Imperial Insignia's office.

sentences.zh: 夏，立皇子越為廣川王，子寄為膠東王。

translations.literal: Summer, installed imperial son Yue as King of Guangchuan, son Ji as King of Jiaodong.
Enfeoffed four marquises.
Ninth month jiayou, solar eclipse.

Middle second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, then did not make peace treaty. Third month, summoned Linjiang King to come. He died in the Central Commandant's office. Summer, established imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, son Ji as Jiaodong King. Enfeoffed four marquises. Ninth month on the day Jiaxu, eclipse of the sun.

sentences.zh: 中三年冬，罷諸侯御史中丞。

translations.literal: Zhongyuan third year winter, dismissed various feudal lords' imperial secretaries.

sentences.zh: 春，匈奴王二人率其徒來降，皆封為列侯。

translations.literal: Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers came to surrender, all enfeoffed as ranked marquises.
Middle third year winter, abolished the feudal lords' imperial secretaries. Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers to surrender, all enfeoffed as marquises.
Zhongyuan fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace.
Great locusts.
Autumn, granted amnesty to convicts working on Yangling.
Middle fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace. Great locusts. Autumn, pardoned convicts working at Yangling.

sentences.zh: 中五年夏，立皇子舜為常山王。

translations.literal: Zhongyuan fifth year summer, installed imperial son Shun as King of Changshan.
Enfeoffed ten marquises.

sentences.zh: 六月丁巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.literal: Sixth month dingsi, granted amnesty to all under Heaven, bestowed nobility one level.
All under Heaven great flooding.
Changed name of feudal lords' prime ministers to administrators.
Autumn, earth moved.

Middle fifth year summer, established imperial son Shun as Changshan King. Enfeoffed ten marquises. Sixth month on the day Dingji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. World great floods. Changed the name of feudal lords' chancellors to 'chancellor'. Autumn, earthquake.

sentences.zh: 中六年二月己卯，行幸雍，郊見五帝。

translations.literal: Zhongyuan sixth year second month jihai, traveled to Yong, performed suburban sacrifice to see Five Emperors.
Third month, rained hail.

sentences.zh: 四月，梁孝王、城陽共王、汝南王皆薨。

translations.literal: Fourth month, King Xiao of Liang, King Gong of Chengyang, King of Runan all passed away.

sentences.zh: 立梁孝王子明為濟川王，子彭離為濟東王，子定為山陽王，子不識為濟陰王。

translations.literal: Installed King Xiao of Liang's son Ming as King of Jichuan, son Pengli as King of Jidong, son Ding as King of Shanyang, son Bushi as King of Jiyin.
Liang divided into five.
Enfeoffed four marquises.

sentences.zh: 更命廷尉為大理，將作少府為將作大匠，主爵中尉為都尉，長信詹事為長信少府，將行為大長秋，大行為行人，奉常為太常，典客為大行，治粟內史為大農。

translations.literal: Changed name of Superintendent of Trials to Grand Judge, Director of Imperial Manufactories to Grand Artisan of Imperial Manufactories, Superintendent of Imperial House to Commandant of Capital, Director of Palace of Enduring Trust to Junior Steward of Palace of Enduring Trust, Director of Empress's Attendants to Grand Steward of Empress's Attendants, Director of Imperial Carriages to Master of Ceremonies, Director of Ceremonies to Grand Master of Ceremonies, Director of Guests to Grand Herald, Director of Grain to Grand Minister of Agriculture.

sentences.zh: 以大內為二千石，置左右內官，屬大內。

translations.literal: Made Grand Interior two thousand shi, established left right interior officials, belonging to Grand Interior.
Seventh month xinhai, solar eclipse.
Eighth month, Xiongnu entered Shangjun.

Middle sixth year second month on the day Jimao, traveled to Yong, offered sacrifices seeing the five emperors. Third month, hail fell. Fourth month, Liang Xiaowang, Chengyang Gongwang, Runan Wang all died. Established Liang Xiaowang's son Ming as Jichuan King, son Peng Li as Jidong King, son Ding as Shanyang King, son Bu Shi as Ji Yin King. Liang divided into five. Enfeoffed four marquises. Changed name of Court Judge to Grand Judge, Construction Foreman to Construction Grand Artisan, Chief of Nobility Commandant to Chief Commandant, Longxin Supervisor of Household to Longxin Junior Steward, Director of the Imperial Household to Grand Chamberlain of the Imperial Household, Grand Usher to Usher, Reverent Constant to Grand Constant, Protocol Secretary to Grand Protocol, Grain Intendant to Grand Farmer. Made the Grand Interior two thousand shi, established left and right interior officials, belonging to the Grand Interior. Seventh month on the day Xinhai, eclipse of the sun. Eighth month, Xiongnu entered Shangjun.

sentences.zh: 後元年冬，更命中大夫令為衛尉。

translations.literal: Houyuan first year winter, changed name of Chamberlain for Imperial Insignia to Commandant of Guards.

sentences.zh: 三月丁酉，赦天下，賜爵一級，中二千石、諸侯相爵右庶長。

translations.literal: Third month dingyou, granted amnesty to all under Heaven, bestowed nobility one level, central two thousand shi and feudal lords' administrators nobility Right Grand Master.
Fourth month, great community feast.

sentences.zh: 五月丙戌，地動，其蚤食時復動。

translations.literal: Fifth month bingxu, earth moved, at breakfast time moved again.

sentences.zh: 上庸地動二十二日，壞城垣。

translations.literal: Shangyong earth moved twenty-two days, destroyed city walls.
Seventh month yisi, solar eclipse.
Prime Minister Liu She dismissed.

sentences.zh: 八月壬辰，以御史大夫綰為丞相，封建陵侯。

translations.literal: Eighth month renchen, made Imperial Secretary Wan Prime Minister, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.

Later first year winter, changed name of central palace guard commander to Guard Commander. Third month on the day Dingyou, pardon the world, grant nobility one level, central two thousand shi, feudal lords' chancellors nobility right grandee. Fourth month, great feast. Fifth month on the day Bingxu, earthquake, at the time of early meal again shook. Shangyong earthquake twenty-two days, destroyed city walls. Seventh month on the day Yiji, eclipse of the sun. Chancellor Liu She resigned. Eighth month on the day Renchen, appointed Imperial Secretary Wan as chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.

sentences.zh: 後二年正月，地一日三動。

translations.literal: Houyuan second year first month, earth moved three times in one day.
General Zhi struck Xiongnu.
Community feast five days.

sentences.zh: 令內史郡不得食馬粟，沒入縣官。

translations.literal: Ordered Interior commandery not to feed horses grain, confiscated into county offices.
Ordered convicts servants to wear seven-span cloth.
Stopped horses pounding grain.

sentences.zh: 為歲不登，禁天下食不造歲。

translations.literal: Because harvest not good, prohibited all under Heaven from eating grain not from current year.
Reduced marquises sent to their states.
Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen.
Tenth month, rented Changling fields.
Great drought.

sentences.zh: 衡山國、河東、雲中郡民疫。

translations.literal: Hengshan state, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.

Later second year first month, earth shook three times in one day. General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu. Feast five days. Ordered interior commanderies not to feed horses grain, confiscate to county officials. Ordered convicts to wear seven-span cloth. Stopped horse pounding. Because the year harvest was poor, prohibited the world from eating unfashionable food. Reduced the marquises sent to their fiefs. Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen. Tenth month, rented Changling fields. Great drought. Hengshan kingdom, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.

sentences.zh: 後三年十月，日月皆（食）赤五日。

translations.literal: Houyuan third year tenth month, sun moon both red five days.
Twelfth month last day, thunder.
Sun like purple.
Five planets moved retrograde guarded Taiwei.
Moon pierced Heavenly Court center.
First month jiayin, crown prince capped.
Jiayou, Emperor Xiaojing collapsed.

sentences.zh: 遺詔賜諸侯王以下至民為父後爵一級，天下戶百錢。

translations.literal: Testament granted feudal lords kings down to people who were heirs to fathers nobility one level, all households under Heaven one hundred cash.

sentences.zh: 出宮人歸其家，復無所與。

translations.literal: Sent out palace women to return to their homes, moreover nothing granted.

sentences.zh: 太子即位，是為孝武皇帝。

translations.literal: Crown prince ascended throne, this was Emperor Xiaowu.

sentences.zh: 三月，封皇太后弟蚡為武安侯，弟勝為周陽侯。

translations.literal: Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang.
Established Yangling.

Later third year tenth month, sun and moon both appeared red five days. Twelfth month last day, thunder. Sun appeared purple. Five stars moved retrograde guarding Taiwei. Moon passed through the heavenly court center. First month on the day Jiazi, crown prince capped. On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing died. Testament granted feudal lords and kings below to people who become heirs nobility one level, world households one hundred cash. Sent out palace people to return to their homes, pardoned without giving anything. Crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu. Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang. Established Yangling.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：漢興，孝文施大德，天下懷安，至孝景，不復憂異姓，而晁錯刻削諸侯，遂使七國俱起，合從而西鄉，以諸侯太盛，而錯為之不以漸也。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Han arose, Xiaowen applied great virtue, all under Heaven cherished peace, reaching Xiaojing, no longer worried about different surnames, but Chao Cuo carved reduced feudal lords, consequently caused seven states all rose, allied horizontally faced west, because feudal lords too powerful, Cuo handled without gradual measures.

sentences.zh: 及主父偃言之，而諸侯以弱，卒以安。

translations.literal: When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, feudal lords became weak, finally peace.
Safety danger mechanism, how not through planning?

The Grand Historian says: Han arose, Emperor Wen applied great virtue, the world felt peaceful, to Emperor Jing, no longer worried about different surnames, yet Chao Cuo cut and reduced the feudal lords, thus caused seven kingdoms to rise together, allied and headed west, because the feudal lords were too powerful, and Cuo did it not gradually. When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, the feudal lords weakened, finally became peaceful. The mechanism of safety and danger, how can it not be due to planning?
